context: Do I need an HD tv for an Xbox One?

context: Will Suite 8 work on a XP computer?
response: Yes very well.   That is assuming that you are talking about 32 bit XP, as it was written for 32 bit operating systems.  I could be wrong about the 64 bit being a problem, as I have no experience with 64 bit systems.

context: what type of language does this game have???
response: The standard is English, but I believe there are Japanese voices if you download them.

context: this game is in spanish?
response: The game audio is in English. There is an option to change the game text to Spanish, but I don't think it affects the audio. I would imagine if you turned on the Spanish text and enabled subtitles, you would be ok.

context: is it for kindle
response: Yes it is for apps that you can get on kindle

context: does this work with the ps3
response: No it does not work with the ps3. But will work with xbox and PC.

context: My son purchased 3ds in usa but found that the 3ds games purchased here in Australia are not compatible . What 3ds  does this game work on?
response: This game is for the US version of the 3DS

context: If you put the Numpad on the left side, could someone measure the gap between the "Enter" key and the A/B Macro keys?
response: Hello Kyle! It will be measuring from the center of the keys, 6 cm = 2.36 inches.

context: is it good and last along time
response: It depends how long you use it.  I've played for hours and it seems to last for a few days. I usually play a couple of hours a day.

context: How well does the Ouroboros perform on non-traditional surfaces, such as cloth?
response: It seems to work well for me.. You do need to recalibrate in Synapse 2.0 though

response: I don't know.  It does say it is compatible with Nintendo Wii though

context: Is this an expansion kit, or is the full FSX installation? This price on this way cheaper than the Gold and Standark packages I see for sale here on A
response: Mine is Microsoft Flight Simulator X GOLD EDITION includes Flight Simulator X DELUXE & ACCECLERATION EXPANSION PACK.  (Disc 1 & 2 DVDs Installation and DVD Rom MFS X Acceleration Expansion Pack).  That's all I know, hope it helps !

context: Will it affect the movement of the thumb sticks?
response: In my experience, the silicone grips did not effect the movement of the controllers thumb sticks at all. They are molded very well to the actual ps4's controllers. I noticed no difference in the thumbs movement after putting them on three of my controllers. I play FPS with these on and they are nothing but a plus.

context: Can you change the colors of the backlighting to red?
response: Sorry - green only

context: Are these easy to install? I would be worried that I do something wrong. I never assembled any controllers before.
response: The  GameCube controller is fairly easy to take apart, just take your time and pay attention to what your doing, pull off the old analogs, and put on the new one's.

context: Can I twist the stick to control yaw in a helicopter  or use it as rudder in a plane?
response: Yes. There is also a "rudder lock" switch but it only cuts off half of the twist axis range of motion. So with the "rudder lock" engaged, you can still easily twist the stick halfway to one side. Better than nothing (I guess) but definitely should do what it actually says.

context: is there a better gaming headphone than this? or this is top of the line?
response: I've owned about 5 headsets in the last 2 years. This has been the best headset I've found on the market when it comes to sound and mic quality. It does lack features like mic mute when boom is up and on can volume controls.

context: I WOULD LIKE TO KNOW THIS NITENDO COME WITH 2 Controllers ??
response: I bought this about a year ago but they sent me a PS2 instead. I'd still like to get a SNES.

context: Is this the controller needed for Heavy Rain?
response: You can use this as well as a standard controller for Heavy Rain. It is totally up to you, they're compatible.

context: Do you get 30 days access to the game with this expansion?
response: No, only with starter pack

context: Did the controller update with little to no improvement for my mic. Did you guys have the same issue?
response: Honestly,   I didn't see any difference

context: Is there a slot in the battery compartment to store the USB nano-receiver when on the road, as with other Logitech gaming mice?
response: On the right side of the batteries there is a slot)

context: If this is a launch day bundle, is the ps4 a first day ps4 which has problems?
response: actually I received this and it did have the blue ring of death!!! but Amazon worked with me and resent me new unit ASAP with no other complaints I love my ps4

context: Does your scroll wheel wobble? Mine wobbles significantly. Makes a jittering noise if I shake the mouse.
response: Thanks for your question.. no, my Mouse scroll Wheel doesn't have any wobble. But it does make a slight noise once in awhile, when scrolling. Other than that it is fine and works very well.

context: How is it compared to keymander?
response: I did not use keymander. But both specification looks similar to each other compared with eagle eye. So i think the price may compared to each other comparison

context: Hello, I am using a Mac (which will work with this, I know) but I only have 1 good usb port, which I use for my mouse. Will I still be able to use?
response: Unless they changed the connection from when i bought one, yes. the connections on mine are a 3.5mm into an adapter that splits the mic and the headphones into their own 3.5mm jacks.

context: Does this work good for the Wii U?  Clueless father buying for son.  He plays Super Smash Bros. most of the time.
response: yes it does, as long as you guys have a gamecube controller adaptor (sold separately from the wii u, I think)
